meta.title: About Smith & Associates Law Firm

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Learn about our story and mission

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Smith & Associates is a leading law firm in Hong Kong with over 20 years of experience in family law, commercial litigation, and corporate law. Our team of dedicated attorneys provides personalized legal solutions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To deliver outstanding results and exceed expectations.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We operate with honesty and transparency

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We embrace new ideas and technologies
